<a id="class_ScriptEditorBase"></a>

# ScriptEditorBase

**Inherits:** [VBoxContainer](class_vboxcontainer.md) **<** [BoxContainer](class_boxcontainer.md) **<** [Container](class_container.md) **<** [Control](class_control.md) **<** [CanvasItem](class_canvasitem.md) **<** [Node](class_node.md) **<** [Object](class_object.md)

Base editor for editing scripts in the [ScriptEditor](class_scripteditor.md).

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

Base editor for editing scripts in the [ScriptEditor](class_scripteditor.md). This does not include documentation items.

<!-- classref-reftable-group -->

<!-- classref-signal -->

**request_save_previous_state**\ (\ state\: [Dictionary](class_dictionary.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_ScriptEditorBase_signal_request_save_previous_state)

<a id="class_ScriptEditorBase_method_add_syntax_highlighter"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

Adds an [EditorSyntaxHighlighter](class_editorsyntaxhighlighter.md) to the open script.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_ScriptEditorBase_method_get_base_editor"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[Control](class_control.md) **get_base_editor**\ (\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_ScriptEditorBase_method_get_base_editor)

Returns the underlying [Control](class_control.md) used for editing scripts. For text scripts, this is a [CodeEdit](class_codeedit.md).
